instructions.ar: انعطف دوراناً عكسياً نحو Shibuya Crossing عند نهاية الطريق

instructions.de: 180°-Wendung an Shibuya Crossing am Ende der Straße
instructions.en: Make a U-turn at Shibuya Crossing at the end of the road
instructions.eo: Turniĝu malantaŭen ĉe Shibuya Crossing ĉe fino de la vojo

instructions.es-ES: Al final de la calle haz un cambio de sentido y continúa en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.fi: Tien päässä tee U-käännös tielle Shibuya Crossing
instructions.fr: Faire demi-tour à la fin de la route en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.he: פנה פניית פרסה על Shibuya Crossing בסוף הדרך
instructions.hu: Forduljon vissza az Shibuya Crossing irányában az út végén
instructions.id: Make a U-turn at Shibuya Crossing at the end of the road
instructions.it: Fai un’inversione a U al Shibuya Crossing alla fine della strada
instructions.ja: Shibuya Crossingの突き当りでUターンする
instructions.my: လမ်းအဆုံးတွင် Shibuya Crossing​ပေါ်သို့ဂ-ကွေ့ကွေ့ပါ
instructions.no: Ta en U-sving i Shibuya Crossing i enden av veien
instructions.pt-BR: Faça o retorno em Shibuya Crossing
instructions.pt-PT: Faça uma inversão de marcha em Shibuya Crossing

instructions.tr: Shibuya Crossing konumunda bir U-dönüşü yap

instructions.yo: Ṣe ayipada U ni Shibuya Crossing
